Notes: This should provide enough seed for 1 Hectare of land
This should feed 12 people for 1 day (or 125 people for 1 day, respectively)
This should provide basic first aid (bandages, oral rehydration salts, etc) for 100 people to self-administer
This should provide medical supplies (medicines, vaccines) for a professional clinic to provide assistance to a total community of 10,000 people.
This kit is suitable to provide emergency repair to a damaged home. It contains a tarpaulin, zinc sheet, wooden poles, hammer & nails
This should house a family of up to 8 people
Personal Hygiene supplies for 100 Households (5 persons/household): Each get 2x Buckets, 10x Soap, Cotton cloth
Designed to provide a 1st phase drinking water purification solution at the household level. Contains 600 sachets to provide sufficient drinking water (4l) for 100 people for 30 days.
